scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a bearded man, likely a prophet or saint, kneeling in prayer. He wears a dark robe and a white mantle with dark spots. Above him, within an arched niche, a divine figure, possibly God or an angel, is shown descending, radiating light and holding a globe. The background features architectural elements, including arched windows with tracery and a brick wall. To the right, draped figures suggest a monastic or devotional setting. The overall composition suggests a moment of divine revelation or intercession.
